work.summary: The MakeSchool Gap Year is a 1 year college supplement that prepares students for a career as a founder or developer.
highlights: First­batch student and dev at a year­long development program focused on application dev and applied CS
Will create original iOS and Ruby on Rails applications

work.summary: MakeGamesWith.Us teaches students to design, code and ship their own original iPhone games.
highlights: Learned iOS technologies (Objective­C, Xcode) through building and shipping a original game to the App Store

work.summary: MDRC is a non-profit devoted to research on issues facing low-income populations and solutions through social policy analysis and reform.
highlights: Custom programming for applications (C# console apps, JavaScript to customize web surveys, SQL statements)
Training material on applications developed and presented regularly

work.summary: The Media Education Foundation produces and distributes documentary films and other educational resources to inspire critical thinking about the social, political, and cultural impact of American mass media.
highlights: Maintenance of social media accounts (Twitter and Facebook) and customer service for a non­profit organization.

work.summary: The Wellesley Centers for Women is a gender-focused research-and-action non-profit.
highlights: Website maintenance and enhancement using Joomla CMS, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
